title: Addendum  Commentary - Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance Chapter 1
description:
I need to add a couple of things, after what I received in the snail mail and the comment section. 

A God that Could be Real: https://www.amazon.com/God-That-Could-Real-Spirituality/dp/0807075957/ref=sr_1_3?keywords=a+god+that+could+be&qid=1554773418&s=gateway&sr=8-3

Emergence of patterns: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J-uz3EeZUAg
